title: Fix /hodge command to show correct status for last feature worked on
description:
The /hodge command incorrectly shows 'explore' mode for shipped features. Root cause: hodge context generates HODGE.md using 'general' for mode detection instead of the session's actual feature, causing a mismatch between detected mode and displayed feature.

Implementation:
1. Modify src/commands/context.ts - loadDefaultContext() method to use session?.feature || 'general' for mode detection
2. Add smoke tests to verify shipped/active/no-session scenarios

Files to modify: src/commands/context.ts, src/commands/context.smoke.test.ts
